duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle various types of incoming inquiries from clients via telephone regarding insurance products, including those impacted by the financial markets.
Deliver exceptional customer service while adhering to departmental guidelines for quality, productivity, and adherence goals.
Participate in customer service training and remain current with operational policies, new products, and procedures.
Manage a heavy call volume and effectively handle customer inquiries received by telephone.
Demonstrate a commitment to Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion by treating everyone with respect and dignity and advocating for change.
